text: Shelly C. Lowe (born 1974/1975) is an American academic administrator. She is the chair of the National Endowment for the Humanities. Since 2022, under the Joe Biden administration. She was a member of the endowment since 2015, after being nominated by President Barack Obama. Lowe is the first Native American to be chair of the National Endowment for the Humanities. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Harvard University faculty Category:Yale University faculty Category:Chairpersons of the National Endowment for the Humanities Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:1970s births
title: Shelly Lowe
